name: FroggieChat
description:
Stupid++ proudly presents...

A faithful remake of Pictochat for Windows and Android.

  • Faithfully handcrafted visuals derived from the original. 👀
  • Four chatrooms. 💬
  • Drawing suggestions. 📝🤔
  • Chat with up to 65535 people at the same time (theoretical limit).
  • Up to 4 colors. 🎨👩‍🎨
  • Up to 36 colors (based on PEAR36). 🎨👩‍🎨
  • A crown for a king. 👑

You have to be on the same network/WIFI to chat.

Stupidplusplus and FroggyChat are not affiliated, associated, authorized, endorsed by, or in any way officially connected with Nintendo Co., Ltd., or any of its subsidiaries or its affiliates.

Version 1.0

  • Initial release
